archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.9.5e: e) using an automated provisioning system (whereby user accounts are created for all target systems, following the creation of an initial entry for a user in a central IAM system)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
